TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ControlPersister extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供在設計階段保存 Web 伺服器控制項的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for persisting Web server controls at design-time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法，可以保存控制項或介面實作 aspx 程式碼的字串。The class provides methods that can persist a control or an interface implementation as a string of aspx code. 這些方法的實作由所驅動中繼資料屬性，例如， ，和。The implementation of these methods is driven by metadata attributes, such as the , , and . > [!NOTE] > Web Forms 網頁設計工具不支援 Reset PropertyName 選擇性屬性持續性的 Microsoft Windows Form 控制項所公開的方法。The Web Forms page designer does not support the ResetPropertyName method that is optionally exposed by Microsoft Windows Forms-based controls for property persistence. 若要建立物件或介面藉由剖析控制項或範本持續性資料的字串，請使用類別方法。To create a object or an interface by parsing a string of control- or template-persistence data, use the class methods. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得資料字串，表示指定控制項之永續性形式。

span.span: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法需要實作能正確運作。This method requires an implementation to work correctly. 這個方法會使用來擷取設計工具主應用程式指定的控制項。This method uses the of the specified control to retrieve the designer host. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ControlParserPersisterExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlParserPersisterExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ControlParserPersisterExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlParserPersisterExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#3)]
